changeSet.createView: select ost.ID ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPES_ID, ost.NAME ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPES_NAME, ci.ID CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_ID, ci.ITEM CONSUMABLE_ITEMS_ITEM from ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPES ost left join ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPES_CONSUMABLES ostc on ost.id = ostc.ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPE_ID left join CONSUMABLE_ITEMS ci on ci.id = ostc.CONSUMABLE_ITEM_ID ORDER BY ORDER_SUBJECT_TYPES_NAME
